snippet: Scott M. Stringer, the Manhattan borough president, has just persuaded prominent national Democrats to join his 2013 campaign.
abstract: Manhattan borough Pres Scott M Stringer has persuaded several prominent national Democrats to join his 2013 campaign, indicating that he may have his sights set on the mayor's office.
lead_paragraph: Scott M. Stringer, the Manhattan borough president, has just persuaded prominent national Democrats to join his 2013 campaign.

headline.seo: Stringer Girds for a Run for Mayor
headline.main: Manhattan Borough President Is Still Aiming High
headline.print_headline: Manhattan Borough President Is Still Aiming High
